Name: FileFlows
Overview: FileFlows lets you process files in a rule flow like system.

WebUI.Name: WebUI
WebUI.Description: Port used to access the WebUI.  The container uses port 5000 this can forward any port to that in the container.

TimeZone.Name: TimeZone
TimeZone.Description: TimeZone for the container refer to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones for a list of possible timezones

NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.Name: NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.Description: If you have multiple NVIDIA GPUs set a specific ID from the settings page

Data.Name: Data
Data.Description: Location of the database file, best to set this in appdata

Logs.Name: Logs
Logs.Description: logging directory, best to store this with the appdata

Temp Directory.Name: Temp Directory
Temp Directory.Description:
Where temporary files will be created during the file flow process
Best to put this on a cache drive or a faster ssd/nvme

/media/.Name: /media/
/media/.Description: Mapping to a folder in unRAID.   this is optional and you can add as many as you like.
